title: Natural Health Remedies, Natural Health Cures, Organic Remedies & Organic Cures
cleaned_text:
This section details some natural health remedies, also referred to as organic cures, and natural health cures for certain specific conditions, ailments and diseases.

Most of these articles are standalone articles, and they have been put together to give a good overview of each individual disease, health condition or ailment.

Scroll down this page or click here for a discussion on this topic. 

 



LIST OF AILMENTS, CONDITIONS & DISEASES 

Click to jump directly to the list of articles on natural health remedies, for a specific health condition or ailment.

FULL LIST OF ARTICLES UNDER "NATURAL HEALTH REMEDIES" 

Natural health remedies for dozens of health conditions and ailments. 

 





Acid Reflux Disease Symptoms and Causes

Gastro-esophageal reflux disease (GERD) is a disease in which liquid in the stomach can back up into the esophagus. Here, you will learn about the causes of the condition, as well as some acid reflux disease symptoms and signs. Read on to find out how you can deal with your acid reflux symptoms naturally.

Anti Acid Reflux Diets - Foods to Eat and Avoid

Without a doubt, the foods you eat play a great role in your acid reflux problem. Here, you will learn about some important tips regarding anti acid reflux diets, including foods to eat and those to avoid.

Acid Reflux Food to Avoid - What to Remove From Your Diet

If you have acid reflux disease, then dietary changes can be a natural treatment to help alleviate the symptoms which it can bring. Here, you will learn about some acid reflux food to avoid.

Foods for Acid Reflux Relief and Recovery

Find out what are some useful foods for acid reflux relief. Include these foods in your daily diet to help you cope better with your acid reflux problems. Read on further to find out what other changes you can make to your diet for better relief to your condition.

Adopt Healthy Eating Habits As Home Remedies For Acid Reflux

Acid reflux not only causes pain and discomfort, but it can also have long term negative health effects. Here are some healthy eating habits that you can adopt easily as home remedies for acid reflux

Lifestyle Changes As Your Natural Remedies For Acid Reflux

Although acid reflux disease is rarely serious, it can be an uncomfortable and frustrating ailment. Here are some useful lifestyle changes you can adopt as natural remedies for acid reflux. Many have experienced relief to their conditions by just making these changes.

Top 6 Herbs And Supplements To Use As Natural Acid Reflux Cures

Acid reflux is an annoying ailment which can have long term negative health effects. Here are some top 6 herbs and natural supplements that you can use as natural acid reflux cures and remedies.

Other Herbs And Supplements For Natural Acid Reflux Treatment

Here are some more herbs and supplements that you may find useful as natural acid reflux treatment. They are easy to use and can allow you to overcome your acid reflux issues quickly and naturally.

The Apple Cider Vinegar Acid Reflux Link

Vinegar has been used for various health purposes by different cultures for many centuries. Here, you will learn about the apple cider vinegar acid reflux link, and how this remedy can be used for dealing with your acid reflux problems.

Acid Reflux Natural Remedies From Holistic Healing Systems

If you have serious acid reflux problems, you could consider seeking help from homeopathic or traditional Chinese medicine practitioners. The acid reflux natural remedies that these holistic healing systems use in dealing with the condition can be very effective. Here, we share more about these natural therapies and what you can expect.

Acid Reflux in Babies - Causes, Symptoms, Treatment and Remedies

Although it is quite common for infants to spit up a little after eating, frequent vomiting might be a sign of gastro-esophageal reflux disease (GERD). Here, you will learn about acid reflux in babies, the signs and symptoms, and the natural remedies for dealing with the ailment.

Baby Reflux - Tips for Relief for Acid Reflux in Infants

Here, you will learn about acid reflux in infants, or what we will call 'baby reflux' for short. Find out what you should take note of, and what can be done to help provide relief to your child.

Acid Reflux In Children

What is acid reflux? What are the signs and symptoms of acid reflux in children? What simple remedies can be used to help deal with this ailment? These and other areas are discussed.

Hope you enjoy these natural health remedies. More natural health remedies will continually be added. 

 

 



What's a "cure"?

Note that a "cure" and a "remedy" have roughly the same definition - that of some sort of therapy which gets rids of disease or relieves pain. I thus use the terms quite interchangeably.

However, the term "cure" has to be read cautiously as, in my opinion, it often gives the mistaken idea of a "magic bullet" (i.e. nothing else has to be done). In addition, conventional allopathic medicine has to some extent tried to monopolize the term.

What we must realize, is that nothing -- no herb, food, drug, chemical or substance -- actually really cures anything. It is the human body, when given the right support and assistance, which cures itself, sorting out systemic imbalances and restoring itself to health.

What about "medicine"?

Generally speaking, I'm also not in favor of using the term "medicine" as it has come to be associated with conventional allopathic medicine and / or drugs. Thus, I don't use terms such as "natural health medicine", "organic medicine", "natural alternative medicine" or even "alternative natural medicine".





Using Natural Health Remedies correctly and effectively

Now, the effects of an unhealthy body manifest themselves in various kinds of pains, discomforts or symptoms, via very complicated processes, many of which we have yet to understand. It is thus often difficult to pinpoint the exact weaknesses and causes of certain conditions in the body. Even then, there do exist certain natural health cures or organic remedies which target and alleviate very specific health problems and issues.

I ask that these cures and remedies be taken in the proper context of things. What do I mean? While these methods may fix certain issues, true and deep health can only be obtained via a holistic change to one's diet and lifestyle. A good foundation would be to follow the good health habits suggested on this website. Following these steps to good health would also strengthen the effectiveness of the natural health remedies and cures mentioned in this section.

One would also have to exercise control and restraint in other ways. For example, if one has a digestive complaint, then it would be a good idea to stay away from foods which over-stimulate the digestive system. In the case of a headache, quality sleep would be important. Or, if one has high cholesterol levels, then certain foods would have to be avoided. Without such efforts, any natural health cure or natural health remedy used would only be a short-term fix and be hampered in its effectiveness.
